name: DockerDeploy
description: Deploy single or multi-container Docker applications to a variety of Azure resources
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: dockerRegistryEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Registry Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker registry connection. Required for deployments that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: dockerComposeFile
inputs.label: Docker Compose File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the primary Docker Compose file to use.

inputs.name: additionalDockerComposeFiles
inputs.label: Additional Docker Compose Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional Docker Compose files to be combined with the primary Docker Compose file. Relative paths are resolved relative to the directory containing the primary Docker Compose file. If a specified file is not found, it is ignored. Specify each file path on a new line.

inputs.name: dockerComposeFileArgs
inputs.label: Environment Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment variables to be set during the command. Specify each name=value pair on a new line.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project name used for default naming of images and containers.

inputs.name: qualifyImageNames
inputs.label: Qualify Image Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically qualify image names for built services with the Docker registry connection's hostname if not otherwise specified.

inputs.name: acsDcosEndpointType
inputs.label: ACS DC/OS Connection Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Container Service DC/OS connection type.

inputs.name: acsDcosMasterUrl
inputs.label: ACS DC/OS Master URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: URL of the Azure Container Service DC/OS master node.

inputs.name: acsDcosSshEndpoint
inputs.label: ACS DC/OS SSH Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Container Service DC/OS SSH connection.

inputs.name: acsDcosAppGroupName
inputs.label: Application Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Marathon application group to deploy.

inputs.name: acsDcosAppGroupQualifier
inputs.label: Application Group Qualifier
inputs.helpMarkDown: Qualifier for the Marathon application group name that is hashed and appended to create a unique identifier for deployment definitions.

inputs.name: acsDcosAppGroupVersion
inputs.label: Application Group Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version for the Marathon application group name that is appended to create a unique identifier for specific deployments.

inputs.name: acsDcosMinimumHealthCapacity
inputs.label: Minimum Health Capacity
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Percentage of the target capacity that existing and new deployments must have at all times during update.

A value of 0 means any existing deployment is removed before the new deployment begins.

A value of 50 means that any existing deployment is scaled to half of its original capacity before the new deployment begins at half of its defined capacity, after which it is scaled to its target capacity and the existing deployment is removed.

A value of 100 means that any existing deployment remains at its target capacity until the new deployment has completed at its target capacity, following which the existing deployment is removed.

See [this](https://mesosphere.github.io/marathon/docs/deployments.html) link for more information on this option.

inputs.name: dockerHostEndpoint
inputs.label: Docker Host Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Docker host connection. Defaults to the agent's host.

inputs.name: requireAdditionalDockerComposeFiles
inputs.label: Require Additional Docker Compose Files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Produces an error if the additional Docker Compose files do not exist. This overrides the default behavior which is to ignore a file if it does not exist.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for any executed commands.
